quote: Nobody can hurt me without my permission.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: You never know how strong you are, until being strong is your only choice.
author: Bob Marley

quote: I learned that it is the weak who are cruel, and that gentleness is to be expected only from the strong.
author: Leo Rosten

quote: A living being seeks, above all, to discharge its strength. Life is will to power.
author: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

quote: Put a stout heart to a steep hill.
author: Egyptian Proverbs

quote: Insincerity is always weakness; sincerity even in error is strength.
author: George Henry Lewes

quote: A single twig breaks, but the bundle of twigs is strong.
author: Tecumseh

quote: Use your weaknesses; aspire to the strength.
author: Sir Laurence Olivier

quote: The weakest link in a chain is the strongest because it can break it.
author: Stanislaw Lec

quote: Life is very interesting... in the end, some of your greatest pains, become your greatest strengths.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: Strength is a matter of a made up mind.
author: John Beecher

quote: Only the weak are cruel. Gentleness can only be expected from the strong.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: A strong woman is a woman determined to do something others are determined not be done.
author: Marge Piercy

quote: A brave man acknowledges the strength of others.
author: Veronica Roth

quote: We are only as strong as we are united as weak as we are divided.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: In the end some of your greatest pains become your greatest strengths.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: Fortitude is the marshal of thought, the armor of the will, and the fort of reason.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Only a strong tree can stand alone.
author: Arnold Glasow

quote: You expect to break me? Impossible! You broke me years ago. You killed me years ago...
author: Charles Manson

quote: That cause is strong which has, not a multitude, but one strong man behind it.
author: James Russell Lowell

quote: Gentleness is the antidote for cruelty.
author: Phaedrus

quote: Look well into thyself; there is a source of strength which will always spring up if thou wilt always look there.
author: Marcus Aurelius Antoninus

quote: The barking of a dog does not disturb the man on a camel.
author: Egyptian Proverbs

quote: To the world you might be one person, but to one person you might be the world.
author: Anonymous

quote: It has always seemed that a fear of judgment is the mark of guilt and the burden of insecurity.
author: Criss Jami

quote: silence is not weakness and decency is not pride
author: Arthur Machen

quote: Flexibility makes buildings to be stronger imagine what it can do to your soul.
author: Carlos Barrios

quote: I actually think one of my strengths is my storytelling.
author: Quentin Tarantino

quote: Courage the most important of all the virtues because without courage you cant practice any other virtue consistently.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: It gives me strength to have somebody to fight for I can never fight for myself but for others I can kill.
author: Emilie Autumn

quote: Put a stout heart to a stey brae.
author: Egyptian Proverbs

quote: If a great thing can be done, it can be done easily, but this ease is like the ease of a tree blossoming after long years of gathering strength.
author: John Ruskin

quote: Gentleness corrects whatever is offensive in our manner.
author: Hugh Blair

quote: We all have enough strength to endure the misfortunes of others.
author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quote: We confide in our strength, without boasting of it; we respect that of others, without fearing it.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Strength instead of being the lusty child of passion, grows by grappling with and subduing them.
author: James Barrie

quote: Its only as bad as you make it.
author: Benjamin J. Carey

quote: Though much is taken much abides and though we are not now that strength which in old days moved earth and heaven that which we are we are  unyielding.
author: Paullina Simons

quote: A threefold cord is not quickly broken.
author: Bible

quote: Nothing is so strong as gentleness, and nothing is so gentle as real strength.
author: Ralph W. Sockman

quote: You want science and studies Fuck you. Ive got scars and blood and vomit.
author: Jim Wendler

quote: I want to live. I want to live life with all its emotions all its experiences I dont want to miss anyhting. But I feel like I will.
author: M. Leighton

quote: Isnt strength the ability to renounce every lie in your heartTamaki
author: Bisco Hatori

quote: People who know me know Im strong but Im vulnerable.
author: Catherine Deneuve

quote: Bullying builds character like nuclear waste creates superheroes. Its a rare occurrence and often does much more damage than endowment.
author: Zack W. Van

quote: believe in a love that is being stored up for you like an inheritance and have faith that in this love there is a strength and a blessing so large that you can travel as far as you wish without having to step outside it.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: We can let circumstances rule us, or we can take charge and rule our lives from within.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Never believe for a second that your weak within all of us we have a reserve of inner hidden strength
author: Victoria Addino

quote: I want to look at you as you kill me.
author: Curtis Jobling

quote: Ein guter Mann ist so stark wie er es fr die richtige Frau sein muss.
author: Gregory David Roberts

quote: I have to learn to find that inner core of strength that I am definitely made up of and stretch it into areas where I dont always use it.
author: Jodie Andrefski

quote: You are like a chestnut burr prickly outside but silkysoft within and a sweet kernel if one can only get at it.  Love will make you show your heart some day and then the rough burr will fall off.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: He who has injured thee was either stronger or weaker than thee. If weaker, spare him; if stronger, spare thyself.
author: Seneca

quote: Although men are accused of not knowing their own weakness, yet perhaps few know their own strength. It is in men as in soils, where sometimes there is a vein of gold which the owner knows not of.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: Only when we cease to rely on our own strength can we discover that Gods strength is always there for us.
author: Scott Hahn

quote: Three things give us hardy strength: sleeping on hairy mattresses, breathing cold air, and eating dry food.
author: Proverbs

quote: There are many ways of getting strong sometimes talking is the best way.
author: Andre Agassi

quote: Tenderness is the rest of passion.
author: Joseph Joubert

quote: I was always looking outside myself for strength and confidence but it comes from within. It is there all the time.
author: Anna Freud

quote: Play to your strength then you are always strong.
author: Silvia Hartmann

quote: What the lion cannot manage to do the fox can.
author: Proverbs

quote: Rudeness is a weak imitation of strength.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: The sun is still there... even if clouds drift over it. Once you have experienced the reality of sunshine you may weep but you will never feel ice about your heart again.
author: Elizabeth Goudge

quote: A soft answer turneth away wrath.
author: Proverbs

quote: Cunning surpasses strength.
author: Proverbs

quote: When the winds of life is pushing you back THATS when you push forward the hardest.
author: Yvonne Pierre

quote: You feel your strength in the experience of pain.
author: Jim Morrison

quote: It is truly said: It does not take much strength to do things, but it requires great strength to decide what to do.
author: Chow Ching

quote: Nothing is so strong as gentleness and nothing is so gentle as real strength.
author: Ralph W. Sockman

quote: A few pens have enough ink to reach the moon but only written words have enough power to unite our world.
author: Jocelyne Forget

quote: Glances of true beauty can be seen in the faces of those who live in true meekness.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Strength is the capacity to break a chocolate bar into four pieces with your bare hands -- and then eat just one of the pieces.
author: Judith Viorst

quote: Know how sublime a thing it is to suffer and be strong.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: In all my perplexities and distresses, the Bible has never failed to give me light and strength.
author: Robert E. Lee

quote: Valor is strength not of legs and arms but of heart and soul it consists not in the worth of our horse or our weapons but in our own.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: There is a saying in Tibetan Tragedy should be utilized as a source of strength.No matter what sort of difficulties how painful experience is if we lose our hope thats our real disaster.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: Crises and deadlocks when they occur have at least this advantage, that they force us to think.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: Strength alone knows conflict; weakness is below even defeat, and is born vanquished.
author: Anne Swetchine

quote: Superior strength is found in the long run to lie with those who had right on their side.
author: James A. Froude

quote: And pitypeople who inspire it in you are actually very powerful people. To get someone else to take care of you to feel sorry for youthat takes a lot of strength smarts manipulation. Very powerful people.
author: Deb Caletti

quote: In the assurance of strength there is strength; and they are the weakest, however strong, who have no faith in themselves or their powers.
author: Christian Bovée

quote: Our real problem, then, is not our strength today; it is rather the vital necessity of action today to ensure our strength tomorrow.
author: Dwight David "Ike" Eisenhower

quote: The path i walk lights up in flames
author: R. Karim

quote: The oak fought the wind and was broken the willow bent when it must and survived.
author: Robert Jordan

quote: Men seem neither to understand their riches nor their strength. Of the former they believe greater things than they should; of the latter, less.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: We acquire the strength we have overcome.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Let others see their own greatness when looking in your eyes.
author: Mollie Marti

quote: Youre not completely alone you have me Even if the entire world turns its back on you youll still be the strongest as long as you have me
author: Kyo Shirodaira

quote: The strength of a man consists in finding out the way God is going, and going that way.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Everything can be taken from you in a second but the human spirit is so strong. War can teach you so much about evil and so much about good.
author: Zainab Salbi

quote: What is exciting is not for one person to be stronger than the other... but for two people to have met their match and yet they are equally as stubborn, as obstinate, as passionate, as crazy as the other.
author: Barbra Streisand

quote: Go so far away that you stop being afraid of not coming back.
author: Eve Ensler

quote: We deceive ourselves when we fancy that only weakness needs support. Strength needs it far more.
author: Madame Swetchine

quote: The block of granite which is an obstacle in the pathway of the weak becomes a stepping-stone in the pathway of the strong.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Courage isnt having the strength to go on  it is going on when you dont have strength.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Strength was the virtue of paganism; obedience is the virtue of Christianity.
author: David Hare

quote: Because your own strength is unequal to the task, do not assume that it is beyond the powers of man; but if anything is within the powers and province of man, believe that it is within your own compass also.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Nothing is so strong as gentleness, nothing so gentle as real strength.
author: Saint Francis de Sales

quote: I used to think you were weak and just didnt fight back ... but now honestly I think youre actually pretty tough. It takes a hell of a lot of strength to not complain and lash out.
author: Richelle Mead

quote: Ein guter Mann ist so stark wie er es fr die richtige Frau sein muss.
author: Gregory David Roberts

quote: I have to learn to find that inner core of strength that I am definitely made up of and stretch it into areas where I dont always use it.
author: Jodie Andrefski

author: Barbra Streisand

quote: Go so far away that you stop being afraid of not coming back.
author: Eve Ensler

quote: We deceive ourselves when we fancy that only weakness needs support. Strength needs it far more.
author: Madame Swetchine

quote: The block of granite which is an obstacle in the pathway of the weak becomes a stepping-stone in the pathway of the strong.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Courage isnt having the strength to go on  it is going on when you dont have strength.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Strength was the virtue of paganism; obedience is the virtue of Christianity.
author: David Hare

quote: Because your own strength is unequal to the task, do not assume that it is beyond the powers of man; but if anything is within the powers and province of man, believe that it is within your own compass also.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Nothing is so strong as gentleness, nothing so gentle as real strength.
author: Saint Francis de Sales

quote: I used to think you were weak and just didnt fight back ... but now honestly I think youre actually pretty tough. It takes a hell of a lot of strength to not complain and lash out.
author: Richelle Mead
